text: varilo ila anu: "Idi (i khur'an) okavela allah taraphu nundi vacci undi, miru dinini tiraskaristu undinatlayite (mi gati emavutundo) miru alocincara? Israyil santatiki cendina oka saksi idi (i khur'an) dani (taurat) lanti granthamenani, saksyam iccadu mariyu visvasincadu kuda. Kani miremo ahambhavaniki guri ayyaru. Niscayanga, allah durmargulaku margadarsakatvam ceyadu
